pullrequest.title: Building Editor: Pick textures from the palette and assign in 3D view

content.raw:
This will be fixed when we implement the menu bar for the Model Editor, because it will become like the Building Editor, where you can't simply toggle it off, you have to exit it. 

This is almost done on branch [model_editor_save](#!/osrf/gazebo/branch/model_editor_save), which will go into default. So I'm not sure about gazebo5 (exiting the model editor currently has a lot of problems).
content.html:
This will be fixed when we implement the menu bar for the Model Editor, because it will become like the Building Editor, where you can't simply toggle it off, you have to exit it.

This is almost done on branch model_editor_save, which will go into default. So I'm not sure about gazebo5 (exiting the model editor currently has a lot of problems).

pullrequest.title: Building Editor: Pick textures from the palette and assign in 3D view

content.raw: You could open the inspector by double-clicking the item in the 2D View and choose the `X` option for the texture. I agree it's not very easy to find. @spaepcke , should we add a blank texture option to the palette? What kind of icon would it have, where would it go? I guess an `X` after the 3 existing textures would be ok.
content.html: You could open the inspector by double-clicking the item in the 2D View and choose the X option for the texture. I agree it's not very easy to find. @spaepcke , should we add a blank texture option to the palette? What kind of icon would it have, where would it go? I guess an X after the 3 existing textures would be ok.

content.raw:
The brick texture does not work for me. I got the following warning messages in `client-11345/default.log`:

```
#!c++
(1421365521 649037002) [Wrn] [BuildingEditorPalette.cc:333] Brushes other than color and texture are handled elsewhere.
(1421365536 997067895) [Wrn] [Visual.cc:952] Unable to get Material[Gazebo/Bricks] for Geometry[BuildingPreview::Wall_0::Visual. Object will appear white
(1421365537 8166677) [Wrn] [Visual.cc:952] Unable to get Material[Gazebo/Bricks] for Geometry[BuildingPreview::Wall_3::Visual. Object will appear white
```
content.html:
The brick texture does not work for me. I got the following warning messages in client-11345/default.log:

(1421365521 649037002) [Wrn] [BuildingEditorPalette.cc:333] Brushes other than color and texture are handled elsewhere.
(1421365536 997067895) [Wrn] [Visual.cc:952] Unable to get Material[Gazebo/Bricks] for Geometry[BuildingPreview::Wall_0::Visual. Object will appear white
(1421365537 8166677) [Wrn] [Visual.cc:952] Unable to get Material[Gazebo/Bricks] for Geometry[BuildingPreview::Wall_3::Visual. Object will appear white

```
./gazebo/gui/building/EditorView.cc:57:  Weird number of spaces at line-start.  Are you using a 2-space indent?  [whitespace/indent] [3]

```

}
